content: the art class cardi is a gorgeous and super easy sweater to stitch up for the cooler months ahead this cardigan can be dressed up or dressed down and stitched up in fun variegated yarn like the one shown here or in a more neutral palette too 2 granny hexagons are cleverly seamed together to make a satisfying and easy as pie project **this pattern is free on the blog or you can purchase the ad-free pattern pdf here on ravelry ** need a little help there s a full video tutorial too
